title._content: [Private Thomas Bobo of H Company, 5th South Carolina Infantry Regiment; H Company, 9th South Carolina Infantry Regiment;  K Company,1st South Carolina Light Artillery Regiment in uniform and hat decorated with flowers] (LOC)

description._content: [Private Thomas Bobo of H Company, 5th South Carolina Infantry Regiment; H Company, 9th South Carolina Infantry Regiment; K Company,1st South Carolina Light Artillery Regiment in uniform and hat decorated with flowers] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 7.4 x 6.2 cm (case) + Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Handwritten note in case: "This picture was taken in time of the war in the sixties. He is my mother['s] brother T[h]omas Bobo" Case: Leather, floral and scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Bobo, Thomas. Confederate States of America.--Army.--South Carolina Infantry Regiment, 5th--People--1860-1870. Confederate States of America.--Army.--South Carolina Infantry Regiment, 9th--People--1860-1870. Confederate States of America.--Army.--South Carolina Light Artillery Regiment, 1st--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--1860-1870. Military uniforms--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32122 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2801
